page.title: 11HULL KINGSTON ROVERS R.L.F.C
page.content: Hull Kingston Rovers play in the first division of the Rugby League and are one of the best teams in the country. Their ground,Craven Park,is on Holderness Road,Hull.It has a capacity of about 16200.The average gate at home games is 6400.On Thursday and Saturday evening,the ground is used for grey hound racing on a track which surrounds the rugby pitch. Rovers nickname is the Robins because of the red band around the players white shirts. In over all charge of the club since 1982 is chairman Colin Hutton.Roger Millward is coach in charge of the first team.Rovers have two other teams,the A team,and the Colts for players under 19. The first team squad are semi professionals under contract.
